entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
